Name: PAIN: Below Sanity
About the game: What happens when you combine suffering , agony and shame ? You get PAIN , of course! What is PAIN, you might wonder? PAIN is a concoction of EVERYTHING EVIL the common human mind can think of. You can also see it as a successful psychological experiment , being able to leave many nerves rekt. What are PAIN's promises? Extreme space-physics Unforgiving and annoying gimmicks NO checkpoints (imagine lol) Timing tomfoolery Why was it created? No one knows.
